N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 7.4 - Employment of teachers

State Regulations

School authorities empowered to employ teachers in the public
schools shall not prescribe as a condition of employment that such teachers
shall or shall not belong to a specified religious denomination or political
party, or shall or shall not have any specified religious belief, creed or
political affiliation. If it be determined by the commissioner, in proceedings
duly brought before him, that a board of education, board of trustees or
trustee of a city or school district, or a committee or officer of such board, has violated this section the commissioner shall withhold the whole or a part
of the public money next payable to such city or district. Notes
